```{r setup}
library(whatthreewords)
```

# Set environment variable



# Get a what3words address from coordinates

```{r}
words_from_coords(lat = 51.5095, 
                  lon = -0.1266)
```

## Full details

```{r}
words_from_coords(lat = 51.5095, 
                  lon = -0.1266, 
                  full_details = TRUE)
```

## Multiple locations

```{r}
locations <- data.frame(name = c("utd", "wed", "fc"), 
                        lat = c(1, 1, 1), 
                        lon = c(1, 1, 1))
locations
```
